summary: Completed comprehensive testing of OhCampus new features (iteration 5). All backend tests passed (18/18). All frontend features working correctly including Level/State/City filters on Courses page, By City and By State tabs on Admin College Management, and Admission Alerts CRUD operations.
passed_tests: Backend: Authentication - Admin and Counselor login (2 tests)
Backend: GET /api/courses/with-college returns courses with college info and level field
Backend: Courses have level field (UG/PG) for filtering
Backend: Courses have college state and city for location filtering
Backend: GET /api/courses/categories/list returns course categories
Backend: GET /api/colleges returns all colleges with city and state fields
Backend: Colleges grouped by city (Bangalore: 5, Chennai: 2, Mangalore: 1)
Backend: Colleges grouped by state (Karnataka: 6, Tamil Nadu: 2)
Backend: GET /api/filters returns cities and states for filtering
Backend: Colleges have admission_alerts field
Backend: Admission alerts have correct structure (title, message, alert_type, is_active)
Backend: PUT /api/colleges/{id}/admission-alerts requires authentication (returns 403)
Backend: PUT /api/colleges/{id}/admission-alerts successfully updates alerts
Backend: Multiple alerts can be added with different types (info, warning, important, deadline)
Backend: All alerts can be removed (empty array)
Backend: All 4 alert types accepted (info, warning, important, deadline)
Backend: 404 returned for non-existent college
Frontend: Courses page - Level filter dropdown (data-testid='level-filter')
Frontend: Courses page - State filter dropdown (data-testid='state-filter')
Frontend: Courses page - City filter dropdown (data-testid='city-filter')
Frontend: Courses page - Category filter dropdown (data-testid='category-filter')
Frontend: Courses page - Level filter (PG) correctly filters courses
Frontend: Courses page - State filter (Tamil Nadu) correctly filters courses
Frontend: Courses page - City filter (Chennai) correctly filters courses
Frontend: Courses page - Shows 22 courses with UG/PG badges and seat status
Frontend: Admin College Management - By City tab (data-testid='tab-by-city')
Frontend: Admin College Management - By State tab (data-testid='tab-by-state')
Frontend: Admin College Management - By City groups colleges correctly
Frontend: Admin College Management - By State groups colleges correctly
Frontend: Admin College Management - Alerts button on college cards
Frontend: Admission Alerts dialog - Opens with college name
Frontend: Admission Alerts dialog - Add New Alert button (data-testid='add-alert-btn')
Frontend: Admission Alerts dialog - Save Alerts button (data-testid='save-alerts-btn')
Frontend: Admission Alerts dialog - Alert Title input field
Frontend: Admission Alerts dialog - Message textarea
Frontend: Admission Alerts dialog - Alert Type dropdown (Info, Warning, Important, Deadline)
Frontend: Admission Alerts dialog - Status dropdown (Active/Inactive)
Frontend: Admission Alerts dialog - Start Date and End Date fields
Frontend: Admission Alerts dialog - Preview badge shows alert type
Frontend: Admission Alerts dialog - Delete button (trash icon)
Frontend: Admission Alerts dialog - Validation error for empty required fields
Frontend: Admission Alerts dialog - Success toast on save
Frontend: Admission Alerts dialog - Alert count badge updates after save
seed_data_creation: Database already seeded with 8 colleges, 22 courses. Colleges have admission_alerts field. Test alert was added and removed during testing.
context_for_next_testing_agent: All new features tested and working: 1) Courses page has Level, State, City filters that work correctly with cascading behavior (city options filter based on selected state), 2) Admin College Management page has 'By City' and 'By State' tabs that group colleges correctly, 3) Admission Alerts dialog allows full CRUD operations - add new alerts with title, message, type (info/warning/important/deadline), status (active/inactive), and optional date range. Alerts are saved to backend and badge count updates. Backend test file at /app/backend/tests/test_iteration5_features.py with 18 comprehensive tests.
